name: You're Not Alone Who Wants To Keep This Restaurant Running
name_original: You're Not Alone Who Wants To Keep This Restaurant Running
description:
This is a game made for the Brackey's Game Jam 8 with the theme "You're Not Alone".

There is a restaurant that sells only salad and french fries, but it's 24 hours. There is no staff other than a chef and a waiter. The restaurant is all they have. Earn as much money and don't let the restaurant get closed down!

This is a local 2 player multiplayer game. Playing as one player is alright, but good luck multitasking.

DEVELOPER'S NOTE: First time players should play the practice mode first!

Fonts used in the game:

New Hi-Score: https://bsl.itch.io/new-hi-score

Humble Fonts Gold: https://somepx.itch.io/humble-fonts-gold
